name: FuroSystems
slogan: Design, manufacture and retail of ultra light high performance electric vehicles
description:
We currently manufacture and retail two full carbon fiber electric bikes, the Furo X, the lightest ebike in the world and the SIERRA, a high performance mountain ebike. We also recently launched the FUZE, a high performance affordable electric scooter.  
These are extremely nimble and provide outstanding performance while remaining affordable as shown by our customer rating on Trustpilot: https://uk.trustpilot.com/review/www.furosystems.com.

jobs.title: Customer Service Specialist
jobs.description:
About the role: 

Are you motivated and positive? Are you affable and agreeable? Do you have experience in customer service and support? Can you show patience in stressful situations? Do you enjoy solving problems? Do you want to join a high performing team in a fast-paced company? 

As Customer Service Specialist at FuroSystems, you will be on the front line, ensuring an excellent relationship with current and prospective customers, solving problems while always reaching for the best, most efficient solutions possible.

Responsibilities: 

•	Answer emails, phone calls, comments and other messages relating to customer sales, service and product enquiries.
•	Receive support and after sales product concerns, find and execute fast adequate solutions to ensure customer satisfaction.
•	Assist with payments and account details.
•	Source from suppliers and dispatch required parts to customers.
•	Assist in booking and conducting customer trials.
•	Improve and maintain FuroSystems’ excellent online rating.

Requirements: 

•	Have excellent written and verbal communication skills, along with the ability to keep emotions under control when dealing with irate or hostile customers.
•	Someone who talking with people and building relationships.
•	Good attention to details.
•	Comfortable working in a fast paced environment using software and computers to communicate with customers and record pertinent information.
•	Good DIY or Technical savviness preferred, comfort with technology and innovation.
